author: powercode
body:
Is it possible?

I guess I would involve running as LocalSystem and use ```WTSQueryUserToken (WTSGetActiveConsoleSessionId (), &hToken) ;``` and ```CreateProcessAsUser```, but I can't figure out how to configure the session.

comments.author: BrucePay
comments.body: Just out of curiosity, what's the scenario you're trying to enable?

comments.author: powercode
comments.body:
Launching AAA games on test machines, monitor it, gather logs and crashdumps, restart it etc.

And doing it without sending clear text passwords.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @powercode it seems that you might be able to [modify the ACL on a winstation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms687391(v=vs.85).aspx) so you can read the screen

title: How can I access the interactive desktop from a JEA endpoint?
